title: COSVII Smart Watch Waterproof, Bluetooth Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate Monitor, Sleep Monitor, Step& Calories Tracker, Alarm Clock, Call/SNS/SMS Reminder, Compatible with Android and iOS (Gray)
feature: 【Activity Tracker】Pedometer, sleep monitoring, calories counter, exercise mileage counter, sedentary reminder, a great companion for sports lovers.

【Call Reminder& Message Push】Download an APP(DaFit) in your phone. Connect the smart wrist watch to your phone via bluetooth. Then you can start the functions of call/SMS/SNS reminding from APDownload an APP(DaFit) in your phone. Connect the smart wrist watch to your phone via bluetooth. Then you can start the functions of call/SMS/SNS reminding from APP. The smart watch will notify you when there is calling and messages from Whatsapp, Twitter, Facebook and other applications that push messages.

【Alarm Clock &Weather Information &Music Control &Camera Control】Stayed connected to your phone, set alarm clock via APP, the watch will vibrate on time. Set weather information automatically synchronized to the smart watch, you can just check weather from smart watch. You can cut and change to next music and take photos by touching the smart watch.

【Wide Compatibility】Our smart watch support all OS9.0&above, and Android4.4&above. Its language can be set to English, Chinese, Korean, German, Spanish, Japanese, French, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Arabic.
